longBusinessSummary: Mold-Tek Technologies Limited provides civil and mechanical design engineering services in India and internationally. The company offers civil and structural services, such as steel detailing, precast detailing, and construction documents and design development; mechanical engineering services for automotive design, press tool and surfacing, special purpose machine, telecom, and utilities; and electrical engineering services that includes design, assembly, and installation of wire harnesses. Mold-Tek Technologies Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Hyderabad, India.
